rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现男孩比女孩更容易受到父母过早死亡的影响《流行病学与社区健康杂志》在线发表的一项大型长期研究的结果表明，过早失去父母对男孩的累积健康和经济影响可能比女孩更大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Boys-more-vulnerable-to-effects-of-premature-parental-death-than-girls-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Boys-more-vulnerable-to-effects-of-premature-parental-death-than-girls-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20caabdf-2d49-4cfb-813f-fbc5124e5760 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 15:44:10 -0400 Boys more vulnerable to effects of premature parental death than girls, study finds
乳腺脂肪组织在乳腺生物学中发挥的作用比之前想象的更加积极西奈山伊坎医学院的一项研究揭示了乳腺脂肪组织与乳房健康之间复杂的相互作用，并为了解乳房发育、哺乳、癌症、肥胖和相关代谢紊乱提供了令人兴奋的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Mammary-fat-tissue-plays-a-more-active-role-in-breast-biology-than-previously-thought.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Mammary-fat-tissue-plays-a-more-active-role-in-breast-biology-than-previously-thought.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f88a332-b175-401d-9510-edf5679285e3 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 15:14:55 -0400 Mammary fat tissue plays a more active role in breast biology than previously thought
美国心脏协会拨款 210 万美元用于研究偏头痛和心血管疾病现有研究表明，某些类型的偏头痛会增加中风的风险，而且越来越多的证据表明，它们还可能导致其他类型的心血管疾病 (CVD)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/American-Heart-Association-grants-2421-million-to-study-migraines-and-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/American-Heart-Association-grants-2421-million-to-study-migraines-and-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=807101f2-a910-4e10-bd17-dd87059612d1 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 15:03:16 -0400 American Heart Association grants $2.1 million to study migraines and cardiovascular disease
研究：低收入国家 82% 的儿童死亡是可以预防的根据国际 CHAMPS 网络在 JAMA Network Open 上发表的一项研究，低收入国家 82% 的儿童死亡是可以避免的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Study-8225-of-child-deaths-in-low-venue-countries-could-be-prevented.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Study-8225-of-child-deaths-in-low-venue-countries-could-be-prevented.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74aee2e5-c0e7-4886-b208-6bc4e9bdea41 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 14:55:13 -0400 Study: 82% of child deaths in low-income countries could be prevented
南加州大学凯克医院在 CMS 2023 质量报告中获得五颗星南加州大学凯克医院在医疗保险和医疗补助服务中心 (CMS) 2023 年质量星级评级报告中获得五颗星，这是可能的最高评级。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Keck-Hospital-of-USC-earns- Five-stars-on-the-CMS-2023-quality-report.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Keck-Hospital-of-USC-earns- Five-stars-on-the-CMS-2023-quality-report.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5438acea-db9e-4bbc-a11e-783a6ea1e19f Wed, 26 Jul 2023 14:33:30 -0400 Keck Hospital of USC earns five stars on the CMS 2023 quality report
黄粉虫蛋白可减缓小鼠体重增加并改善代谢健康随着全球人口在不断变化的气候下增长，寻找可持续蛋白质来源的紧迫性比以往任何时候都更加紧迫。植物性“肉类”和“乳制品”可能很受欢迎，但它们并不是唯一的环保肉类替代品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Mealworm- Protein-slows-weight-gain-and-improves-metabolic-health-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Mealworm- Protein-slows-weight-gain-and-improves-metabolic-health-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bdbef5d8-6741-46de-8f6d-e27e776fe77c Wed, 26 Jul 2023 14:29:25 -0400 Mealworm protein slows weight gain and improves metabolic health in mice
静态等距练习对于降低收缩压和舒张压最有效《英国运动医学杂志》在线发表的一项对临床试验现有证据的汇总数据分析发现，静态等距练习（即无需移动即可调动肌肉的练习，例如靠墙坐和平板支撑）最适合降低血压。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Static-isometric-exercises-most- effective-for-reducing-both-systolic-and-diastolic-blood-Pressure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Static-isometric-exercises-most- effective-for-reducing-both-systolic-and-diastolic-blood-Pressure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e681cd64-7a2d-4a63-90a0-2f2fa0f36994 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 14:01:00 -0400 Static isometric exercises most effective for reducing both systolic and diastolic blood pressure
研究人员发现横纹肌肉瘤的潜在新疗法来自耶拿莱布尼茨衰老研究所和科特布斯-森夫滕贝格勃兰登堡理工大学的研究人员发现了一种治疗软组织肿瘤的新方法，这种肿瘤经常发生在儿童中，并且通常是恶性的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Researchers-discover-pottial-new-treatment-for-rhabdomyosarcoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Researchers-discover-pottial-new-treatment-for-rhabdomyosarcoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3704431-0090-4972-9adf-3ffefbf396b9 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 13:45:52 -0400 Researchers discover potential new treatment for rhabdomyosarcoma
Epileptika 旨在帮助治疗智力障碍人士的难治性癫痫瓦伦西亚理工大学 (UPV) 的一组研究人员参与了 Epileptika 的开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Epileptika-aims-to-help-treat-refractory-epilepsy-in-people-with-intellectual-disability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Epileptika-aims-to-help-treat-refractory-epilepsy-in-people-with-intellectual-disability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f623d20-aea8-4d76-b91a-899231fde428 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 13:28:12 -0400 Epileptika aims to help treat refractory epilepsy in people with intellectual disability
研究发现亚洲成年人院外心脏骤停后的生存率存在差距根据今天发表在《美国心脏协会杂志》上的最新研究，尽管院外心脏骤停后旁观者进行心肺复苏的比率相似，但在美国的亚裔成年人的存活率低于白人成年人。 -美国心脏协会杂志的评论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Study-finds-gap-in-survival-rates-for-Asian-adults-after-out-of-hospital-cardiac-arrest.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Study-finds-gap-in-survival-rates-for-Asian-adults-after-out-of-hospital-cardiac-arrest.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc1c630b-ae91-40a0-84c9-6ac0eb732203 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 12:57:47 -0400 Study finds gap in survival rates for Asian adults after out-of-hospital cardiac arrest
